mapper.insert: insert into EQUIPMENT_NAME_INFO (ID, EQUIPMENT_TYPE_ID, EQUIPMENT_NO, EQUIPMENT_NAME, CREATE_PERSON, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, ORG_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update EQUIPMENT_NAME_INFO set EQUIPMENT_TYPE_ID = #{equipmentTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EQUIPMENT_NO = #{equipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EQUIPMENT_NAME = #{equipmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_PERSON = #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATETIME = #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from EQUIPMENT_NAME_INFO eni left join EQUIPMENT_TYPE_INFO eti on eni.EQUIPMENT_TYPE_ID = eti.id
